interface.name: XAConnection
interface.javadoc:
An object that provides support for distributed transactions. An XAConnection object may be enlisted in a distributed transaction by means of an XAResource object. A transaction manager, usually part of a middle tier server, manages an XAConnection object through the XAResource object.

An application programmer does not use this interface directly; rather, it is used by a transaction manager working in the middle tier server. 1.4

Retrieves an XAResource object that the transaction manager will use to manage this XAConnection object's participation in a distributed transaction. the XAResource object SQLException if a database access error occurs SQLFeatureNotSupportedException if the JDBC driver does not support this method 1.4
